__e: Look, you've told me all the terrible things that could happen.

Description: Here is this game in which should race the awful folks to the complete line with a specific end goal to spare the day. Drive as quick as you can and ensure that you don't come up short on life.
I can't go back there. He'll make me do something terrible to you and your friends.
